name: Adyen Payments
description: Adyen is a global multichannel payment company offering businesses an outsourced payment solution, which enables merchants to accept payments from anywhere in the world and provides a global payment solution for mid, large and enterprise e-commerce merchants. Adyen has over ten years of experience in running high-volume payment systems. Adyen is a privately owned, profitable company which realized 50m turnover in 2012.
